original_text: Some people are very wise and clever. They use their knowledge to provide good things for themselves. But after they die, someone else will have all their things. Their good things will belong to someone who did not have to work to get them. This also has no purpose. It only brings trouble. Some people are very wise and clever. They use their knowledge to provide good things for themselves. But after they die, someone else will have all their things. Their good things will belong to someone who did not have to work to get them. This also has no purpose. It only brings trouble.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 그 지혜와 지식과 재주를 다하여 수고하였어도 그가 얻은 것을 수고하지 아니한 자에게 그의 몫으로 넘겨 주리니 이것도 헛된 것이며 큰 악이로다

sentences.original_text: Some people are very wise and clever.
to provide good things for themselves.
someone else will have all their things.
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람이 그들의 모든 것을 가지게 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: Their good things will belong to someone
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 좋은 것들은 다른 사람에게 속하게 될 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: who did not have to work to get them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 얻기 위해 일할 필요가 없었던 사람에게.
